description: It's a new kind of cruise that combines your love of travel with your desire to make a difference.
details: I built the Journey Planner for Fathom Cruises. The Journey Planner is a web application that cruise passengers use to manage and lookup info for things like: personal details, shore excursions, luggage tags, boarding passes, other passengers on the same booking.
title: Fathom Cruises

description: Adjoy is the first ad network for games that allows both game developers and the advertiser, big or small, to live together in perfect harmony.
details: Adjoy is a well funded startup looking to innovate in-game and other types of ads by integrating them into the experience. I was the lead API designer for this project and played a pivotal role in bringing their MVP product to production.
title: Adjoy

description: The only app that lets you add products with product images to your WooCommerce store!
details: This is a personal product of mine. I saw a need for this app after working with clients who own an ecommerce store. This app has a pretty sizeable user base and it's still growing.
title: WooProducts

description: A set of UI components for building React Native apps.
details: My brother and I created this set of React Native components to build our apps and we're happy that other people in the community like it and are using it too.
title: Carbon Native
